item.title: FiNERweb: Datasets and Artifacts for Scalable Multilingual Named Entity Recognition
item.description: arXiv:2512.13884v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Recent multilingual named entity recognition (NER) work has shown that large language models (LLMs) can provide effective synthetic supervision, yet such datasets have mostly appeared as by-products of broader experiments rather than as systematic, re...<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> arXiv | <strong>Keywords:</strong> research, large language model, product, LLM, vision | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>
item.author: noreply@contextengineering.news (arXiv)

item.title: Olmo 3
item.description: arXiv:2512.13961v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We introduce Olmo 3, a family of state-of-the-art, fully-open language models at the 7B and 32B parameter scales. Olmo 3 model construction targets long-context reasoning, function calling, coding, instruction following, general chat, and knowledge re...<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> arXiv | <strong>Keywords:</strong> instruction, arxiv, release, reasoning, context | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>
item.author: noreply@contextengineering.news (arXiv)
